sourcesContent:
import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; function Detail() { const location = useLocation(); const appointment = location.state.appointment; const doctor = location.state.doctor; console.log("Functions: bookAppointment"); const [isDatesOpen, setIsDatesOpen] = useState(true); const toggleAccordion = () => { setIsDatesOpen(!isDatesOpen); }; const [isTimeOpen, setIsTimeOpen] = useState(false); const toggleTime = () => { setIsTimeOpen(!isTimeOpen); }; const [selectedSchedule, setSelectedSchedule] = useState({ hospital: appointment.name, doctorId: doctor.id, doctorName: doctor.name, day: "", date: "", time: "", }); const handleChangeSelectedScheduleTime = (e, time) => { e.preventDefault(); setSelectedSchedule((prevSchedule) => ({ ...prevSchedule, time: time, })); }; const schedule = [ { day: "Sun", date: "16 Mar", time: [ "09:00 - 09:15", "09:15 - 09:30", "09:30 - 09:45", "09:45 - 10:00", "10:00 - 10:15", "10:15 - 10:30", ], }, { day: "Mon", date: "17 Mar", time: [ "14:00 - 14:15", "14:15 - 14:30", "14:30 - 14:45", "14:45 - 15:00", "15:00 - 15:15", "15:15 - 15:30", "15:30 - 15:45", "15:45 - 16:00", "16:00 - 16:15", "16:15 - 16:30", ], }, { day: "Tue", date: "18 Mar", time: [ "10:30 - 10:45", "10:45 - 11:00", "11:00 - 11:15", "11:15 - 11:30", "11:30 - 11:45", ], }, { day: "Wed", date: "20 Mar", time: [ "15:30 - 15:45", "15:45 - 16:00", "16:00 - 16:15", "16:15 - 16:30", "16:30 - 16.45", "16:45 - 17:00", ], }, ]; const navigate = useNavigate(); const bookProfessional = (selectedSchedule) => { navigate("/confirmAppointment", { state: { selectedSchedule } }); }; return (

Electronic Health Record Sharing System

History

{appointment.type} {appointment.name}

{doctor.name}

{doctor.specialty}

Specialty Procedures / Treatments

list of procedure and treatments...

Qualifications & Certifications

list of qualitifcations and certifications...

Appointments

{appointment.name}, XX Road 33, Tai Po, New Territories

{schedule.map((scheduleItem) => ( ))}
Available Time
{schedule.map( (scheduleItem) => scheduleItem.date === selectedSchedule.date && scheduleItem.time.map((time, index) => ( handleChangeSelectedScheduleTime(event, time) } > {time} )) )}
); } export default Detail;
